title: Stock Futures Fall as Ukraine Crisis Continues
sub_head: The escalation of tensions over Moscowâ€™s invasion of Ukraine has heightened anxieties in the financial markets
body:
Stock futures fell and oil prices jumped Sunday evening as investors grappled with geopolitical developments including new sanctions by Western countries against Russia.
Futures for the S&P 500 dropped 2.6%, while futures for the tech-heavy Nasdaq-100 index declined 2.7%.
